name: aereal
body:
Kyoto, Japan

## Social

 * [Hatena](http://www.hatena.ne.jp/aereal/)
 * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/aereal)
 * [GitHub](https://github.com/aereal)

## Works

 * [Hated](https://github.com/aereal/hated) - An mocking server which can be utilized for designing [Hatena Diary](http://d.hatena.ne.jp)
 * [Gestopft](https://github.com/aereal/gestopft) - Framework for CLI Application
 * [Swaf](https://github.com/aereal/swaf) - More user-friendly interface for [swf_ruby](https://github.com/tmtysk/swf_ruby)

## Others

 * [Photos](http://500px.com/aereal)
 * [Diary](http://d.aereal.org/)
 * [Photolog](http://foto.aereal.org/)
 * [Technology columns](http://this.aereal.org/)
